description: Try our easy to follow Miso Soup with Ocean Trout recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Miso Soup with Ocean Trout Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g portion ocean trout, skin and bones removed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat.
Brush ocean trout with combined sesame oil and garlic. Cook for 2 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking.
Remove from pan and cool. Drain tofu on paper towel and slice.
Bring 1.5 litres of water, mirin and soy sauce to the boil in a large pan. Add noodles, reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in miso powder and remove from heat.
Flake the fish and add to the pan with the tofu and mushrooms.
Stand for 2 minutes then ladle into soup bowls and top with shallots.
